gameRatingDescriptionLong: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

i18n.displayName: Dragon Age™: Inquisition - Dragonslayer Multiplayer Expansion
i18n.longDescription:
High dragons have moved into island ruins on the Fereldan Coast. These creatures are extremely dangerous and will annihilate the South – that is, unless you strike before their rampage fully begins. Set off in a new, unique map and do what you must to stop the threat at all costs. Luckily, you won't have to do it alone. Three new playable heroes have joined the battle: an Avvar Skywatcher, a deadly Virtuoso, and Isabela, the Raider Queen of the Eastern Seas herself. Gather your party, embark on this multiplayer adventure, and claim your place among the dragon slayers of legend.

Battle in an all-new map. ﻿This journey will take you to the southern Fereldan Coast in a new, unique map, where you'll face your greatest challenge yet.

Three new playable characters. The Avvar Skywatcher uses a powerful mix of elemental magic and melee to achieve victory. Then there's Zither, a skilled Virtuoso who controls a broad range of magic through his lute, altering the flow of battle and giving an edge to his companions. Finally, Isabela – so-called admiral and Queen of the Eastern Seas – is a duelist whose skill and speed is unmatched.

Encounter hostile high dragons. The rarest of all dragonkin, high dragons have invaded island ruins on the southern Fereldan Coast. These are some of the most dangerous creatures in existence – if you don't strike and take them out, the South is surely lost. May Andraste guide you.
i18n.onlineDisclaimer: REQUIRES PURCHASE OF DRAGON AGE: INQUISITION (SOLD SEPARATELY). INTERNET CONNECTION AND ORIGIN ACCOUNT REQUIRED TO ACCESS ONLINE FEATURES. YOU MUST BE 13+ TO REGISTER. EA ONLINE PRIVACY AND COOKIE POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE CAN BE FOUND AT www.ea.com. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AND SERVICES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
i18n.shortDescription: Battle High Dragons in an All-new Map.
i18n.systemRequirements:
Minimum:

OS: Windows 7 or 8.1 64-bit
Processor (AMD): Quad core @ 2.5 GHz
Processor (Intel): Quad core @ 2.0 GHz
Memory: 4 GB
Graphics Card (AMD): Radeon HD 4870
Graphics Card (NVIDIA): GeForce 8800 GT
Graphics Memory: 512 MB
Hard Drive: 26 GB
Sound: DirectX 10

Recommended:

OS: Windows 7 or 8.1 64-bit 
Processor (AMD): Six core @ 3.2 GHz
Processor (Intel): Quad core @ 3.0 GHz
Memory: 8 GB
Graphics Card (AMD): Radeon HD 7870 or R9 270
Graphics Card (NVIDIA): GeForce GTX 660
Graphics Memory: 2 GB
Hard Drive: 26 GB
Sound: DirectX 11

* Xbox 360 controller supported 
* 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card 
* Online Authentication at time of installation
